verbs.description: [ARG0: MSNBC contributor Hugh Hewitt] [V: defended] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-MNR: by asserting that it is " ordinary and routine " for people to tweet about their own accomplishments on Memorial Day] .
